translations: 再发行（reissue 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: The novel was reissued in paperback.
sentences.translation: 这本小说重新发行了平装本。

sentences.sentence: Her novels have just been reissued with eye-catching new covers.
sentences.translation: 她的小说刚进行了重印，新封面非常抢眼。

sentences.sentence: The material will not be reissued if lost.
